channel.title: makeGlobalObject ('RichScape)
channel.description:
Okay,
I am trying to add some general objects (Bank booths, altars, etc.), but there is no makeGlobalObject or deletethatobject in any of the files. I am using 'RichScape, so is there a alternative way to add Objects? Or should I create a seperate makeGlobalObject.
